name: Road Motorcycle
description:
Road Motorcycle is a motorcycle racing game. The game uses realistic 3D pictures to simulate real roads.
[Game control]
Acceleration: W
Brake: S
Left: L
Right: D
[Game features]
The player controls the motorcycle to drive at a very fast speed on the road. There will be many different cars in front of you to block you. You need to control the direction of the motorcycle to avoid these cars.
If the speed of motorcycle is too fast, it will affect the avoidance of cars, so it is necessary to control the speed reasonably.
The longer the game lasts, the higher the added points will be.
The game will become more and more difficult as time goes by. It is not easy to get high scores. Those who like challenges can try.
